pr_title: Take provision lock before session lock

timeline.message:
Take provision lock before session lock

This avoid deadlocks with internal redeployments that may take the locks in a
different order.

timeline.bodyText: Consider making an AutoCloseable class to replace these lines and the tenant.getApplicationRepo().lock().
timeline.author: hakonhall

replies.bodyText: Tried it, didn't make the flow clearer imo.
replies.author: mpolden
